title: OCE NEEDS A TRIBUNAL | ELO TROLL'S , TOXICITY
body:
*Dear Riot,*

I'm Sick of this Riot you can't just make stupid bot's run the Oceania Region report system its lazy barely anyone gets banned if they are reported for something not even reviewed by actual staff. Please Riot Bronze would be a much better place without these trolls imagine how immensely popular the game would become i know people who wont play the Oceania Region just because of the ranked, Compared to the other region's , Oce has the worst ELO trolls around A.K.A The people who would rather feed/troll in bronze 5 then actually get to somewhere like gold That is the soul reason i'm still in bronze 5, So please riot support the Oceania region and {{summoner:4}} away from Trolls using the tribunal system run by Riot games Oce staff.


Also Please Remove Satan from the game ({{champion:17}}  :)

Bump/Like this post to put my message our message out to riot.

replies.body:
>That is the soul reason i'm still in bronze 5

You can't blame trolls for that in ranked. Because of the way it's designed, they will appear on both teams. If you were truly better skilled than that, then the amount of games you win compared to the games you lose will *eventually* get you to a higher division. If you find that you're stuck there, well...

And many people like playing Teemo. You shouldn't just get rid of him just because *you* don't like him. That's rather selfish.

I do agree with the Tribunal idea, if only we didn't have one yet. We do, but it's just in recess.
